name: Busaba
description:
Inspired by folk tales in Southeast Asia which is a story that a common culture in the area. It is the story of a beautiful princess who is engaged to a prince of rubbish. In the story told, the prince had been engaged to her from a young age, but the prince unfaithfully fell in love with a woman from another country and also slandered his fiancée as ugly , not as beautiful as his lover. 

However, seeing the beauty of the princess, he changed his mind, relentlessly chasing after her and eventually married her in the end.

If this princess was really existed, a story like this would be her tragedy. Women in that era could not decide anything on their own, like a man's property. This was no different from a sad story that has been beautifully decorated by an author. How beautiful words he used, how hurrible he was.
